name: The Boy (Marcus Seeger)
description:
You are in desperate need to find a young boy who has just been stolen away by a group of men who seem to be part of a gang. Why has the boy been kidnapped by a gang? And why are you in such a hurry to find this mysterious young boy? Play this Action-Adventure game to find out. 

After completing the game, leave your thoughts below on what you think of the outcome?
